titleStmt.title: A true relation of the materiall passages of Lieut. Col. Iohn Lilburnes sufferings, as they were represented and proved before the Right Honourable, the House of Peeres, in Parliament assembled, the 13. day of this instant Feb. 1645. Vnto which is annexed their Lordships order, made upon the bearing of the cause.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Lilburne by Wing.
The order of the Lords is dated: 13 Feb. 1645 [i.e. 1646].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
